data.title: Little Crossword
data.statement:
Given an input string [[s]] of capital letters. You have to display the string <<horizontally>>. At every letter, matching the first of the string, you have to display the string [[s]] additional <<vertically>>, beginning with the letter in the horizontal-string.
Same with the last letter, but this vertical display has to end in the last string's letter.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Given an input string s of capital letters. You have to display the string horizontally. At every letter, matching the first of the string, you have to display the string s additional vertically, beginning with the letter in the horizontal-string.
Same with the last letter, but this vertical display has to end in the last string's letter.
Input
A string s in capital letters.
Output
The input-String with "Additions"
Constraints
0 < Length s <= 100
Example
Input
JOE
Output
  J
  O
JOE
O
E
